commit message:
Prevent user from entering GPS update interval > max run time.

(which would be silly, indeed)

Code cleanup: replaced an AsyncTask with a plain Thread.

AsyncTask is pointless in this context.

Add error handling when writing to file.

This is only a sample script, but many use it as is and then email me only
to find out that they can't write to file for some reason.  This should
help them sort it out by themselves. (Although I like chatting with
users ;)
Prevent from having to hit Back twice in order to exit when coming from the notification bar.
